so let's begin recipes to make the broth
our vegetarian soup you're gonna need
one Apple one pair two cups of corn one
daikon radish and some leek it will be
really nice to have some a preserved or
salted radish go Kamui you can buy these
in a package at Asian store if you can't
find them it's okay to skill for the
toppings you're going to need some fried
tofu pots some mushrooms of your choice
today I use straw and oyster mushrooms
you can also use button mushrooms
shiitake or any other kinds of mushrooms
that you like you can buy dried ho-tu
noodles in a package like this at Asian
store to firstly peel the vegetables and
fruits and cut into about one and a half
inch cubes or chunks for one part of
whole to you I use about three results
radishes I could half of them into one
and a half inch pieces then I cut the
rest into thin strips and chop finely
also cut the white part of the leek into
thin strips and then chop finely feel a
large pot with four liters or 16 cups of
water then add all the cuts fruits and
vegetables also add two small cubes of
rock sugar a tablespoon of salt and the
cute preserved radishes the preserved
radish as the depth of flavor to the
broth add some oil in a frying pan
and fry them in sleek when it turns
golden brown
transfer to a small ball repeat the same
with about three tablespoons of minced
garlic with a little bit four laps on
the pan quickly stir fry the mince
radish lower the heat and season with a
teaspoon of sugar then transfer to a
small bowl then ask the more are in the
pan and stir fry the mushrooms season
with a tablespoon or two of light soy
sauce and a teaspoon of mushroom
seasonings which is optional stir fry
for about a minute and you will see the
mushrooms produce quite some liquid now
we're going to throw in the fried tofu
pups to suck off all the juice then
season to your tight with salt and
pepper and a teaspoon of mushroom
seasonings if you have if you glad to

hotel bowl you can leave some pieces of
dried tofu skin into hot oil to turn

oil and take out immediately because if
you leave it in the hot oven more than
one second they will turn very Brown
like this that's not very nice before
cooking the noodles you can soak them in
water for about 15 minutes
insert a handful of noodles into the
noodle strainer and submerge into the
boiling water cook until it reaches your
desired softness also blanch some bean
sprouts for a few seconds in the boiling
water transfer the noodles and bean
sprouts into the serving bowl top with
the stir fried mushrooms and tofu for
more flavors and fragrance add the fried
leek and garlic
and the store freights amines preserved
radish these small items really make a
big difference in your noodle bowl after
simmering the broth for about an hour
have a taste and season with more salt
and mushroom seasonings then ladle the
broth over the noodle bowl and garnish
with some cilantro you can also add some
chilli slices for more color contrast
and extra heat fill it up with a piece
of crispy tofu skin you can serve this
with a platter of bean sprouts garlic
chives and Asian celery a few chili and
lime wedges to serve squeeze in the bowl
some lime juice add the greens that you
like have a sip of the flavorful broth
